Title: Relates to the election to have federal and/or state income tax deducted and withheld from an individual's unemployment insurance benefits
Summary: Relates to the election to have federal and/or state income tax deducted and withheld from an individual's unemployment insurance benefits.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to the election to have federal and/or state income tax deducted and withheld from an individual's unemployment insurance benefits
